/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++0x -DGL_GLEXT_PROTOTYPES -I/opt/X11/include -g    CMakeFiles/glfwMinimal.dir/glfwMinimal.cpp.o  -o glfwMinimal  -L/home/eleves/promo16/info/kotulski/local_install/lib  -L/usr/local/lib -rdynamic -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lGLEW -lglfw3 -lrt -lXrandr -lXinerama -lXi -lXcursor -lGL -lm -ldl -lXrender -ldrm -lXdamage -lX11-xcb -lxcb-glx -lxcb-dri2 -lxcb-dri3 -lxcb-present -lxcb-sync -lxshmfence -lXxf86vm -lXfixes -lXext -lX11 -lpthread -lxcb -lXau -lXdmcp -Wl,-rpath,/home/eleves/promo16/info/kotulski/local_install/lib:/usr/local/lib
